title: Several smaller sites have no structured data
description:
Some sites serve recipe pages without JSON-LD or Microdata:
- bakingbites.com: 12 URLs, 0% extraction rate
- sprinklebakes.com: ~26 URLs failed
- Scattered older posts on other sites

Same root cause as smittenkitchen-no-structured-data but lower volume. Would benefit from the same raw HTML fallback extraction.
